item.title: Home Drinks
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1470733144433{margin-top: -20px !important;}"][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias="home-drinks"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" fixed_background="center" css=".vc_custom_1470843747712{padding-top: 4vw !important;padding-bottom: 4vw !important;background-image: url(http://8theme.com/import/xstore/versions/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/08/single-bg.jpg?id=5017) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-xs"][vc_custom_heading text="We just want to provide you a good wine" font_container="tag:div|font_size:25|text_align:center|color:%23a5a093|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_custom_heading text="FEATURED PRODUCTS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:42|text_align:center|color:%23262626|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1470836952090{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm"][vc_custom_heading text="We just want to provide you a good wine" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23a5a093|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_custom_heading text="FEATURED PRODUCTS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:35|text_align:center|color:%23262626|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1470762758897{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Browse the collection of our best selling and top interesting products. You'll definitely find what you are looking for.

[/vc_column_text][etheme_products orderby="post__in" limit="6" phones="2" ids="" large="3" notebook="3" tablet_land="2" tablet_portrait="2" mobile="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1470665081457{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1470745446335{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1470837504209{margin-top: 7.1vh !important;margin-bottom: 7vh !important;padding-top: 25px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1470762816091{margin-top: 2.3vh !important;}"][vc_cta h2="1" h2_font_container="font_size:48px|color:%23262626|line_height:0" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%20Condensed%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" txt_align="center" shape="square" style="flat" color="white" css_animation="appear" use_custom_fonts_h2="true" css=".vc_custom_1470754532982{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 2vw !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 2vw !important;}"]

Order Product

FIRST STEP

Browse the products from your favorite category, add to your basket and make an order in a few clicks.[/vc_cta][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1470762823007{margin-top: 2.3vh !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_cta h2="2" h2_font_container="font_size:48px|color:%23262626|line_height:0" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%20Condensed%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" txt_align="center" shape="square" style="flat" color="white" css_animation="appear" use_custom_fonts_h2="true" css=".vc_custom_1470754539662{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 2vw !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 2vw !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}"]

Payment Process

SECOND STEP

Choose the most appropriative payment method.Be sure to be incognito and secure with your details.[/vc_cta][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1470762828013{margin-top: 2.3vh !important;}"][vc_cta h2="3" h2_font_container="font_size:48px|color:%23262626|line_height:0" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%20Condensed%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" txt_align="center" shape="square" style="flat" color="white" css_animation="appear" use_custom_fonts_h2="true" css=".vc_custom_1470754546133{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 2vw !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 2vw !important;}"]

UK Delivery

THIRD STEP

Take advantage of our faster three-five days shipping service with quick delivery throughout the world.[/vc_cta][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" fixed_background="center" css=".vc_custom_1470843772387{padding-top: 5vw !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-image: url(http://8theme.com/import/xstore/versions/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/08/home-page-bg.jpg?id=5018) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-xs"][vc_custom_heading text="We just want to provide you a good wine" font_container="tag:div|font_size:30|text_align:center|color:%23a5a093|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_custom_heading text="THE HIGHEST QUALITY OF SPIRITS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:48|text_align:center|color:%23262626|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1470746206804{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm"][vc_custom_heading text="We just want to provide you a good wine" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23a5a093|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_custom_heading text="THE HIGHEST QUALITY OF SPIRITS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:35|text_align:center|color:%23262626|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1470762950948{margin-bottom: 5px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Variety of product categories, tens of products, only five-stars reviews. Various portfolio layouts to create beautiful galleries and present your work in a best way. Browse the collections right now.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

[button style="medium bordered" url="#" icon="" title="Read more"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1470750496858{background-color: #ffffff !important;}" el_class="visible-gallery"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1470751023031{margin-top: -10% !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_basic_grid post_type="etheme_portfolio" max_items="4" element_width="3" gap="0" item="5023" initial_loading_animation="slideInUp" grid_id="vc_gid:1470843917554-ab349eeb-6644-0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1470749893749{padding-top: 3vw !important;padding-bottom: 5vw !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1470751119343{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1470749605721{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

Be always up to date with our blog

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-xs"][vc_custom_heading text="LATEST POSTS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:42|text_align:center|color:%23262626|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1470836944699{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm"][vc_custom_heading text="LATEST POSTS" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:35|text_align:center|color:%23262626|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1470762904837{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][et_blog_carousel items_per_page="4" exclude="2156" large="3" notebook="3" tablet_land="2" tablet_portrait="2" mobile="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1470824635137{padding-top: 0px !important;}" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][rev_slider_vc alias="home-drinks-2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
